itemInfo.itemDesc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Lynch Farm Ruins.

item.name: Demihuman Longsword
item.desc: A longsword made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Demihuman Longbow
item.desc: A longbow made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Demihuman Amulet
item.desc: An amulet made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Demihuman Axe
item.desc: An axe made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Demihuman Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Demihuman Staff
item.desc: A staff made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Ultimate Demihuman Staff
item.desc:
A Demihuman staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Demihuman staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Demihuman Staff of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Staff of Destruction, Demihuman Staff of Temptation, Demihuman Staff

item.name: Demihuman Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Demihuman Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Staff of Temptation, Demihuman Staff

item.name: Demihuman Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Demihuman Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Staff of Destruction, Demihuman Staff

item.name: Demihuman Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Demihuman Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Staff of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Staff

item.name: Demihuman Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Ultimate Demihuman Shortsword
item.desc:
A Demihuman Shortsword developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Demihuman Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Shortsword of Destruction, Demihuman Shortsword of Temptation, Demihuman Shortsword

item.name: Demihuman Shortsword of Temptation
item.desc:

It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Shortsword of Temptation, Demihuman Shortsword

item.name: Demihuman Shortsword of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Demihuman Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Shortsword

item.name: Ultimate Demihuman Amulet
item.desc:
A Demihuman Amulet developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Demihuman Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Amulet of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Amulet of Destruction, Demihuman Amulet of Temptation, Demihuman Amulet

item.desc:

item.name: Ultimate Demihuman Axe
item.desc:
A Demihuman Axe developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Demihuman Axe.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Axe of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Axe of Destruction, Demihuman Axe of Temptation, Demihuman Axe
